content:
Sprawl out in this roomy suite, featuring a bedroom with a king bed and sunken jacuzzi tub, living room, dining area, fully equipped kitchen, and one and a half baths.

1 King Bed & 1 Sofabed
784 square feet / rate is for 2-4 people

STARTING FROM $198 PER NIGHT
* Excluding taxes, $3 per person per night Recreation Fee and 19% Service Charge.
